summary: This bill, H.R. 249, proposes to honor Congressman Bill Pascrell, Jr. by redesignating two specific facilities within the Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park. It seeks to rename the "Great Falls Scenic Overlook Trail Bridge" to the "Bill Pascrell, Jr. Scenic Overlook Trail Bridge" and "Overlook Park" to "Bill Pascrell, Jr. Overlook Park." The bill ensures that all official references in laws, maps, documents, and other U.S. records are updated to reflect these new names.
